channel.title: 2019 on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: H.R. 4170 - Ensuring National Constitutional Rights for Your Private Telecommunications Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Lieu, Ted and DelBene, Suzan and Jordan, Jim Published: August 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/116/bills/hr4170/BILLS-116hr4170ih.pdf Tags: 2019 Bill ENCRYPT Act of 2019 Federalism State's Rights US Congress Abstract: A Bill To preempt State data security vulnerability manfates and decryption requirements.

item.title: H.R. 4978 - Online Privacy Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Eshoo, Anna G. and Lofgren, Zoe Published: December 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/4978/text Tags: 2019 Bill Data Protection Online Privacy Act of 2019 Privacy Rights US Congress Abstract: To provide for individual rights relating to privacy of personal information, to establish privacy and security requirements for covered entities relating to personal information, and to establish an agency to be known as the United States Digital Privacy Agency to enforce such rights and requirements, and for other purposes.
